metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34927 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: MilkyTracker v1.03.00 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via the component LoaderXM::load. This vulnerability is triggered when the program is supplied a crafted XM module file.

criterions.comment: milkytracker: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
